About Me

Introduction

BIO

My name is Bankole Ayodele a graduate of Computer science, an IT professional, experienced full stack developer, data scientist and a database administrator.

I have great experience working as a team and have successfully pulled hands-on-projects as a freelance, I also have a few cousera IBM certificates to show for it, these can be found on my linkedin profile page. I have the skills to work under pressure, my colleages would sometimes refer to me as bold and workaholic.


National Space Research and Development Agency

Assitant Database Administrator

I am responsible for performing activities related to maintaining a successful database environment, assist in creating email for staffs and also backup and recovery plans and procedures based on agancy's best practices. As a team we create dashboards, graphs and data visualization, set up and maintain automated data process.


Software Labs

Full Stack Developer

We are responsible for developing both the front end and the back end of web development using frontend languages, backend technologies and frameworks with outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills and exceptional learning agility.


Freelance

West African Examination Council

Senior Checker

I worked in the accounting the department, performing Data Entry and auditing tasks on data and information processing, before data is being forwarded to the head office for confirmation. This is part-time job, occurs twice a year.
